verses.verse: The <S%G3588><s%> elder <S%G4245><s%> unto the <S%G3588><s%> well-beloved <S%G27><s%> Gaius, <S%G1050><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> love <S%G25><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the truth. <S%G225><s%>

Beloved, <S%G27><s%> I wish <S%G2172><s%> above <S%G4012><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> that thou <S%G4571><s%> mayest prosper <S%G2137><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> be in health, <S%G5198><s%> even as <S%G2531><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> soul <S%G5590><s%> prospereth. <S%G2137><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> I rejoiced <S%G5463><s%> greatly, <S%G3029><s%> when the brethren <S%G80><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> testified <S%G3140><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> truth <S%G225><s%> that is in thee, <S%G4675><s%> even as <S%G2531><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> walkest <S%G4043><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the truth. <S%G225><s%>

I have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> greater <S%G3186><s%> joy <S%G5479><s%> than <S%G5130><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> hear <S%G191><s%> that my <S%G1699><s%> children <S%G5043><s%> walk <S%G4043><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> truth. <S%G225><s%>

Beloved, <S%G27><s%> thou doest <S%G4160><s%> faithfully <S%G4103><s%> whatsoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> thou doest <S%G2038><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> brethren, <S%G80><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> strangers; <S%G3581><s%>

Which <S%G3739><s%> have borne witness <S%G3140><s%> of thy <S%G4675><s%> charity <S%G26><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the church: <S%G1577><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> if thou bring forward on their journey <S%G4311><s%> after a godly sort, <S%G516><s%> <S%G2316><s%> thou shalt do <S%G4160><s%> well: <S%G2573><s%>

Because <S%G1063><s%> that for his name's sake <S%G5228><s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G3686><s%> they went forth, <S%G1831><s%> taking <S%G2983><s%> nothing <S%G3367><s%> of <S%G575><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Gentiles. <S%G1484><s%>

We <S%G2249><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> ought <S%G3784><s%> to receive <S%G618><s%> such, <S%G5108><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> we might be <S%G1096><s%> fellow helpers <S%G4904><s%> to the <S%G3588><s%> truth. <S%G225><s%>

I wrote <S%G1125><s%> unto the <S%G3588><s%> church: <S%G1577><s%> but <S%G235><s%> Diotrephes, <S%G1361><s%> who loveth to have the preeminence <S%G5383><s%> among them, <S%G848><s%> receiveth <S%G1926><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> not. <S%G3756><s%>

Wherefore, <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> I come, <S%G2064><s%> I will remember <S%G5279><s%> his <S%G846><s%> deeds <S%G2041><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he doth, <S%G4160><s%> prating against <S%G5396><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> with malicious <S%G4190><s%> words: <S%G3056><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> content <S%G714><s%> therewith, <S%G1909><s%> <S%G5125><s%> neither <S%G3777><s%> doth he <S%G848><s%> himself receive <S%G1926><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> brethren, <S%G80><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> forbiddeth <S%G2967><s%> them that would, <S%G1014><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> casteth <S%G1544><s%> them out of <S%G1537><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> church. <S%G1577><s%>

Beloved, <S%G27><s%> follow <S%G3401><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> that which is evil, <S%G2556><s%> but <S%G235><s%> that which is good. <S%G18><s%> He that doeth good <S%G15><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> God: <S%G2316><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> he that doeth evil <S%G2554><s%> hath not <S%G3756><s%> seen <S%G3708><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

Demetrius <S%G1216><s%> hath good report <S%G3140><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men, and <S%G2532><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> truth <S%G225><s%> itself: <S%G846><s%> yea, <S%G1161><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> also bear record; <S%G3140><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ye know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> record <S%G3141><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> true. <S%G227><s%>

I had <S%G2192><s%> many things <S%G4183><s%> to write, <S%G1125><s%> but <S%G235><s%> I will <S%G2309><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> with <S%G1223><s%> ink <S%G3188><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> pen <S%G2563><s%> write <S%G1125><s%> unto thee: <S%G4671><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> I trust <S%G1679><s%> I shall shortly <S%G2112><s%> see <S%G1492><s%> thee, <S%G4571><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> we shall speak <S%G2980><s%> face to face. <S%G4750><s%> <S%G4314><s%> <S%G4750><s%> Peace <S%G1515><s%> be to thee. <S%G4671><s%> Our friends <S%G5384><s%> salute <S%G782><s%> thee. <S%G4571><s%> Greet <S%G782><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> friends <S%G5384><s%> by <S%G2596><s%> name. <S%G3686><s%>
